description: "The title of this mid-18th century map of Sumatra and the Malay Peninsula claims that it was based on the diaries of sailors. Interestingly, the title is repeated in both German and French, as are the names of some of the locations marked on the map."
title: "Karte von dem eylande Sumatra nach den tagebüchern der schiffer : und vielen karten, die bey der kammerwegendes see wesens in verwahrung liegen / durch den Hrn Bellin Ing. ord. de la Marine."
